anya-e0105n20:1_0: Bahū pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā dhammānandādayo “ācariyabuddhaghosatthero dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti
anya-e0105n20:1_1: vadanti. Ayaṁ panettha yutti, yebhuyyena hi aṭṭhakathāṭīkākārā therā dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhikāyeva.
anya-e0105n20:1_2: Tathā hi buddhavaṁsaṭṭhakathāya ca abhidhammāvatāraṭṭhakathāya ca vinayavinicchayaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n20:1_3: ca kārako ācariyabuddhadattatthero coḷaraṭṭhe tambapaṇṇinadiyaṁ uraganagare jāto
anya-e0105n20:1_9: veditabbo. Vuttañhi manorathapūraṇiyā nāma aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya nigamane –
anya-e0105n20:4: Ettha ca kañcipuraṁ nāma madarasanagarassa īsakaṁ pacchimanissite dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcacattālīsamilappamāṇe padese idāni kañjīvara iti voharitanagarameva.
anya-e0105n20:7: Pubbe mayūradūta mayūrarūpa (sī.), mayūrasutta (syā.) paṭṭanamhi saddhiṁ vasantenā”ti – vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n20:8: Ettha ca mayūradūtapaṭṭanaṁ nāma idāni madarasanagarasamīpe milapora iti voharitaṭṭhānanti porāṇappavattigavesīhi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n20:9_0: Imāhi pana nigamanagāthāhi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭheyeva nivutthapubbataṁ pakāseti, bodhimaṇḍasamīpe
anya-e0105n20:9_1: vā, marammaraṭṭhe vā nivutthapubbatāya pakāsanañca na dissati. Tena ācariyabuddhaghoso
anya-e0105n20:9_2: dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko na hotīti na sakkā paṭikkhipituṁ.
anya-e0105n20:11_0: “Yaṁ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṁ vinā jagatiyā
anya-e0105n20:11_1: pamukhaṁ sandhāya kathita’nti vuttaṁ, taṁ andhakaraṭṭhe pāṭekkasannivesā ekacchadanā
anya-e0105n20:12_0: Iminā pana vacanena “andhakaṭṭhakathā andhakaraṭṭhikehi therehi katā”ti pākaṭā hoti,
anya-e0105n20:12_2: suṭṭhu jānāti, tasmā tandesiko na hotīti na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0105n20:13_0: Tathā imassapi visuddhimaggassa nigamane – “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti vuttaṁ. Ettha
anya-e0105n20:13_1: ca kheṭoti padassa gāmoti vā, jānapadānaṁ kassakānaṁ nivāsoti vā, khuddakanagaranti
anya-e0105n20:13_2: vā tayo atthā sakkatābhidhāne pakāsitā, dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhesu ca yāvajjatanāpi gāmo
anya-e0105n20:13_3: kheḍāti voharīyati. Tasmā moraṇḍavhaye kheṭe jāto moraṇḍakheṭako, moraṇḍakheṭako
anya-e0105n20:13_4: iti vattabbo moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbo, tena moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenāti vacanatthaṁ
anya-e0105n20:13_5: katvā “moraṇḍagāme jātoti vattabbena therenā”ti attho gahetabbo. Idāni pana dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe
anya-e0105n20:13_6: guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍato ekapaṇṇāsamilamatte (51) amaravatito ca aṭṭhapaṇṇāsamilamatte
anya-e0105n20:13_7: (58) padese kotanemalipurīti ca gundalapallīti ca voharitaṁ ṭhānadvayamatthi, tattha
anya-e0105n20:13_8: ca bahūni buddhasāsanikaporāṇasantakāni diṭṭhāni, nemalīti telaguvohāro ca morassa,
anya-e0105n20:13_9: gundalu iti ca aṇḍassa, tasmā taṁ ṭhānadvayameva pubbe moraṇḍakheṭoti voharito ācariyabuddhaghosassa
anya-e0105n20:13_10: jātigāmo bhaveyyāti porāṇaṭṭhānagavesīhi gahito. Yasmā panetaṁ “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti
anya-e0105n20:13_11: padaṁ “moraṇḍagāmajātenā”ti padaṁ viya pāḷinayānucchavikaṁ na hoti, aññehi ca bahūhi
anya-e0105n20:13_12: visesanapadehi ekato aṭṭhatvā visesyapadassa pacchato visuṁ ṭhitaṁ, āgamaṭṭhakathādīsu
anya-e0105n20:13_13: ca na dissati, tasmā etaṁ kenaci taṁkālikena ācariyassa jātiṭṭhānaṁ sañjānantena
anya-e0105n20:14_0: Imesu pana tīsu “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jātoti ca marammaraṭṭhikoti
anya-e0105n20:14_1: ca dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko”ti ca vuttavacanesu pacchimameva balavataraṁ hoti ācariyasseva
anya-e0105n20:14_2: vacananissitattā, tasmā tadeva nissāya ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti evaṁ veditabbā.
